# rearrangeObjects()

**Instance Method**

Triggers filtering of the receiver’s content.

## Declaration

```swift
func rearrangeObjects()
```

## Discussion

This method invokes [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSArrayController/arrange(_:)].

When you detect that filtering criteria change (such as when listening to the text sent by an `NSSearchField` instance), invoke this method on `self`.

## Related Documentation

- **didChangeArrangementCriteria()**: Invoked when any criteria for arranging objects change.

## Arranging Objects

- **arrange(_:)**: Returns a given array, appropriately sorted and filtered.
- **arrangedObjects**: An array containing the receiver’s content objects arranged using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSArrayController/arrange(_:)].
